title: Maharashtra poll results 2025: BJP gains, Sena & NCP factions struggle | Full breakdown
description:
In this episode of Pulse Maharashtra, we break down the major takeaways from the recently held municipal council and Nagar Panchayat elections across the state. The video explores how these polls unfolded after a long gap, why they were considered a crucial test for Maharashtra’s key political parties, and what the results reveal about shifting dynamics on the ground.

We look at the performance of the BJP, the challenges faced within the Mahayuti alliance, the impact of the Shiv Sena and NCP splits, and the emerging trends in regions like Vidarbha, Konkan, and the Mumbai Metropolitan area. The episode also highlights how different parties approached the campaign, the internal tensions that surfaced, and what these outcomes could signal as Maharashtra prepares for the upcoming municipal corporation elections, including the high‑stakes battle for Mumbai.

Video and presentation: Vinaya Deshpande
Editing: Tayyab Hussain S M

title: 5 reasons why your digestion gets worse in the winters

UN at 80: Ellora caves host global cultural celebration with artists from 7 nations
description: As the United Nations marks 80 years, a rare cultural celebration unfolded at the Ellora Caves in Chhatrapati Sambhajinagar. From classical and fusion performances to recreated historic concerts and heritage tours, artists and dignitaries from over 35 countries came together at the Kailasa temple to celebrate shared values of culture, spirituality, and peaceful coexistence. The event highlighted Ajanta and Ellora as India’s first UNESCO World Heritage Sites and showcased India’s living cultural heritage on a global stage.

description: A 10-year-old girl was found dead in a jungle in Bhadrak district. She had gone to school and did not return home. Family members found her body and filed a police complaint. Police are investigating the case as assault and murder. Angry locals blocked the highway demanding justice for the victim.

title: Vinod Kumar Shukla, first Jnanpith awardee from Chhattisgarh, dies at 88
description: Renowned Hindi writer Vinod Kumar Shukla passed away at 88 after a lung ailment. The first Jnanpith awardee from Chhattisgarh, Shukla was known for his quiet grace and focus on ordinary people's inner worlds. He continued writing even in the ICU, leaving behind a legacy of profound literature.

title: 'Kicked her in stomach': Man assaults pregnant woman while celebrating Jagan Reddy's birthday
description: A man in Sri Sathya Sai district was arrested and paraded for allegedly assaulting a six-month pregnant woman. The incident occurred when the woman objected to loud cracker bursting during a birthday celebration. Police have registered a case and emphasized strict action against crimes targeting women and children.

title: Magnesium and dementia risk: What happens to your brain when you take magnesium daily
description: New research suggests that increasing magnesium intake could significantly benefit brain health and potentially lower dementia risk. Studies indicate higher magnesium levels are linked to larger brain volume and fewer lesions, suggesting a younger-looking brain. Incorporating magnesium-rich foods like leafy greens, nuts, and seeds is recommended for optimal cognitive function as we age.

title: Paul Rudd reacts to Travis Kelce’s apology after Chiefs’ playoff exit
description: Actor Paul Rudd shared his perspective on the Kansas City Chiefs' season. He highlighted the joy and memories the team has provided his family. Rudd embraced the team's elimination from playoff contention. He wished Patrick Mahomes a speedy recovery. Rudd also humorously suggested players deserved a break after a long season. He stated he was not too upset.

title: Taylor Swift opens up about cancer scare and Travis Kelce’s support
description: Taylor Swift opened up about a painful chapter during the Eras Tour, revealing how a backup singer’s cancer diagnosis deeply shook her tour family. The experience marked an emotional low point, but Swift said she later found renewed joy and stability in her personal life, crediting Travis Kelce with bringing light and happiness after an incredibly difficult period.

title: Shane McMahon and Marissa Mazzola’s combined net worth in 2025
description: Shane and Marissa Mazzola-McMahon possess a combined net worth of $650 million, largely attributed to Shane's decades with WWE and his diversified business ventures. While Shane's wealth stems from his executive roles, on-camera presence, and equity in WWE, Marissa's career in film production and PR augments their family fortune.

title: Salesforce reboots AI strategy: Model errors raise concerns
description: Salesforce is scaling back its reliance on large language models due to reliability issues, shifting focus to deterministic automation in its Agentforce product. Executives acknowledge a decline in trust in AI models, with reported instances of models omitting instructions and losing focus. This strategic pivot follows significant support staff reductions attributed to AI agent deployment.

title: Who is Brittani? Inside Aaron Rodgers’ wife as marriage mystery deepens
description: Steelers quarterback Aaron Rodgers has found unexpected peace in his marriage to Brittani.  Unlike his previous public relationships, Brittani values privacy.  Rodgers credits his wife with providing unconditional love and stability.  This new chapter sees a calmer, more focused Rodgers as he navigates his final NFL years.  His teammates and coaches notice the positive change.

title: Vince & Linda McMahon net worth in 2025: WWE earnings, careers and investments
description: Wrestling titans Vince and Linda McMahon boast a $3.2 billion net worth in 2025, largely from their WWE empire and TKO Group Holdings shares. Vince's legacy in transforming wrestling is undeniable, while Linda also carved a significant business and political path. Despite recent legal challenges for Vince, their financial success endures.
